definition: Fails counts the number of positions that closed with a negative profit loss, in the context of the parent node.

paragraphs.text: The workings of the fail counts are analogous to the workings of the hits counts, reversing the sign. That is, when profit loss is negative, it is counted as a fail. Please refer to the definition of hits for the details.
To add the fails node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
